Bash(python3 -c "import sys,json; data=json.load\(sys.stdin\); text=data[0][''text'']; 
import re
matches = re.findall\(r''createServerReference\\\([^\)]+\\\)'', text\)
for m in matches:
    print\(m\)
    print\(''---''\)
")

Bash(python3 -c "
import sys, json, re
data = json.load\(sys.stdin\)
text = data[0][''text'']
# Search for createServerReference with a wider pattern
matches = re.findall\(r''createServerReference\\\(.{20,120}?\\\)'', text\)
for m in matches:
    print\(m\)
    print\(''---''\)
")
